floater.name: gui_preview_tool
floater.title: XUI Preview Tool
floater.string: Select an editor by setting the environment variable LL_XUI_EDITOR or the ExternalEditor setting or specifying its path in the "Editor Path" field.

button.label: Show
button.name: display_floater
button.tool_tip: Display the XUI floater defined by the selected XML file

button.label: Hide
button.name: close_displayed_floater
button.tool_tip: Closes the currently-displayed floater, if one exists

button.label: Edit...
button.name: edit_floater
button.tool_tip: Edit the XUI floater defined by the selected XML file (opens external editor). Opens en version if no localized version exists.

button.label: Save
button.name: save_floater
button.tool_tip: Save the XUI floater defined by the selected XML file

button.label: Save All
button.name: save_all_floaters
button.tool_tip: Save all XUI floaters defined by the selected language

button.name: toggle_overlap_panel
button.tool_tip: Toggle highlighting and display panel for overlapping elements; right-click an element to select it for this feature. The selected element is marked by a red rectangle.

button.label: Show
button.name: display_floater_2
button.tool_tip: Display the XUI floater defined by the selected XML file

button.label: Hide
button.name: close_displayed_floater_2
button.tool_tip: Closes the currently-displayed floater, if one exists

line_editor.name: executable_path_field
line_editor.tool_tip: The full path to an editor (executable) to edit floater XML files (quotes not necessary)

button.label: Browse...
button.name: browse_for_executable
button.tool_tip: Browse for an editor (executable) to edit floater XML files

line_editor.name: executable_args_field
line_editor.tool_tip: Command-line arguments to the editor; use '%FILE%' to refer to the target file; 'YourProgram.exe FileName.xml' will be run if this field is empty

line_editor.name: vlt_diff_path_field
line_editor.tool_tip: The full path to an XML D0 or D1 localization difference file generated by the Viewer Localization Toolkit

button.label: Browse...
button.name: browse_for_vlt_diffs
button.tool_tip: Browse for a VLT-generated D0 or D1 difference file to highlight changed files and elements

button.label: Highlight Diffs
button.name: toggle_vlt_diff_highlight
button.tool_tip: Toggle highlighting of files and elements containing changed localization data

overlap_panel.label: Overlap Panel
overlap_panel.name: overlap_panel
overlap_panel.tool_tip: This panel displays the currently-selected element and all of the elements that overlap it, separated by horizontal lines
